# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

imp_get_process_exit_code("setup_application foxs" status ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
                          COMMAND ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/tools/build/setup_application.py
                          --name=foxs
                          --datapath=${IMP_DATAPATH}
                           --source=${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})
if(NOT ${status})
message("Application IMP.foxs ok")
include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH} ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/foxs/lib)
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

if(${IMP_SPLIT_PYTHON_TESTS})
imp_execute_process("get_python_tests foxs" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
                    COMMAND ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/tools/build/get_python_tests.py
                          --application=foxs
                          ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})
endif()


   add_executable("foxs" ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/foxs/foxs.cpp ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/foxs/lib/ColorCoder.cpp ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/foxs/lib/Gnuplot.cpp ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/foxs/lib/JmolWriter.cpp)
   target_link_libraries(foxs
    ${IMP_SAXS_LIBRARY} ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY} ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY} ${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY} ${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY}
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES} ${ANN_LIBRARIES} ${CGAL_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties(foxs PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/bin")
   install(TARGETS foxs DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
   set(bins ${bins} foxs)

add_custom_target("IMP.foxs" ALL DEPENDS ${bins})


set(pybins )
foreach (pybin ${pybins})
  install(PROGRAMS ${pybin} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
endforeach(pybin)

set(pytests ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/foxs/test/test_saxs.py)
foreach (test ${pytests})
  GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
  if(EXISTS "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/foxs/${name}.pytests")
    FILE(READ "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/foxs/${name}.pytests" contents)
    STRING(REGEX REPLACE ";" "\\\\;" contents "${contents}")
    STRING(REGEX REPLACE "\n" ";" contents "${contents}")
    foreach(testline ${contents})
      string(REGEX REPLACE "([A-Za-z0-9_]+\\.[A-Za-z0-9_]+) (.*)" 
                           "\\1;\\2" split "${testline}")
      list(GET split 0 methname)
      list(GET split 1 docstring)
      add_test("foxs.${name}.${methname}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh python ${test} "${methname}")
      set_tests_properties("foxs.${name}.${methname}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.foxs;test")
      set_tests_properties("foxs.${name}.${methname}" PROPERTIES MEASUREMENT "docstring=${docstring}")
    endforeach()
  else()
    add_test("foxs.${name}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh python ${test})
    set_tests_properties("foxs.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.foxs;test")
  endif()
endforeach(test)


else()
message("Application foxs disabled")
endif()
